channel.title: [Delta] Donor Shop Rep++[317]
channel.description: Hello, i was hoping somone could enlighten me on how to replace buying an item with coins, for. Buying an item with donor points. For example. If i wanted to buy Dragon Claws, it would cost 10 donor points, and then those 10 points would be taken away from me. I'm not sure of the exact code that would do this so if someone could post it, or show me in the right direction i'd be grateful. I'll rep++ if you can help :)

item.title: [Delta] Donor Shop Rep++[317]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“xX CoDeR AJ, post:1, topic:398015”]You cant rep but go into Src->Server->model->Shops-> ShopAssistant.java and search for the shop id

you should see something like this: } if (c.myShopId == 15) { c.sendMessage("This item current costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + "coins."); return;
where it says “coins” change it to donatorpoints or however you spell your system for that.[/quote]Erm… All that will do is make it say “This item current costs ## donor points”. thats all it will do

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Donor Shop Rep++[317]
item.dc:creator: @reward reward
item.description:
@reward wrote:

Hello, i was hoping somone could enlighten me on how to replace buying an item with coins, for. Buying an item with donor points.
For example.
If i wanted to buy Dragon Claws, it would cost 10 donor points, and then those 10 points would be taken away from me.
I’m not sure of the exact code that would do this so if someone could post it, or show me in the right direction i’d be grateful.
I’ll rep++ if you can help
